title: R. Nicholas Burns - Wikipedia

title: R. Nicholas Burns - Former Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs
snippet: Mr. Burns, a career Senior Foreign Service Officer, served for five years (1990-1995) on the National Security Council staff at the White House. title: Biography: Amb. R. Nicholas Burns
snippet: He was Special Assistant to the Counselor of the Department of State from 1989-1990, responsible for Soviet and Eastern European Affairs. He was a member of the Department's Transition Team in 1988, and served as Staff Officer in the Department's Operations Center and Secretariat in 1987-1988.
